builder().Description: Creates a builder for a Street View panorama camera.

builder(com.google.android.gms.maps.mode.Description: Creates a builder for a Street View panorama camera

Parameters: Zoom level of the camera to the panorama. See @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#StreetViewPanoramaCamera#Builder#zoom_E@ for details of restrictions.
The camera angle, in degrees, from the horizon of the panorama. See @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#StreetViewPanoramaCamera#Builder#tilt_E@ for details of restrictions.
Direction that the camera is pointing in, in degrees clockwise from north. This value will be normalized to be within 0 degrees inclusive and 360 degrees exclusive.
Throws: if tilt is outside the range of -90 to 90 degrees inclusive.
